ygData.subject: Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Any advice on how to make some major money to buy spells. Seems like they are getting really expensive. Anyone else worried about having enough cash to buy
ygData.messageBody:
Any advice on how to make some major money to buy spells. Seems like they
are getting really expensive. Anyone else worried about having enough cash
to buy those spells? I also have a level 11 monk named Doorn. I can make
pretty good money with him in BlackBurrow but don't have anything to spend
it on, yet. Looking at the price of those next rank spells seems to me that
it might take a while to get them all. I don't think I could even do it with
my monk at some of those higher rank spells.
----- Original Message -----
From: Briles <briles@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 9:18 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Well met good friend enchanters!


> From: "Briles" <briles@...>
>
> Good thing the illusion spell doesn't use much mana because they dont last
> long. So if you are going to sneak in a town I would suggest recasting it
a
> couple times just to be safe. You don't want to die in the middle of
Neriak
> and not be able to retive your possiesions.
>
> Morphis
> E'ci
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: brucep <brucep@...>
> To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
